::DarkMouse::

She winced as he kicked her foot. She tried to stand, holding onto 
him with a firm grip. She was able to stand on her feet, but she was 
shaking.  She moved her left leg and took a step.  Her leg started to 
collaps and she held herself up by clinging to Quickstrike.  She was 
getting rather upset at all this.  She wanted to walk and by the 
Maxtrix, she was going to. She took another step. She looked up at 
Quickstrike and smiled. She looked down and took another step. She 
was hanging on to him but at least she was starting to walk again.
"Well, it's a start." she chuckled, "Mind if I just hang on here 
while you take me to my new room?" she said with a slight smirk.  She 
hoped he would just let her hang on and slowly walk her to her room.
She was getting tired already from all this.  She would be exhausted 
by the time she got to her room at this rate.


---Original Message-----
> Quickstrike:
> 
> 
> 
> "Don't give me that slag!" He grabbed Dark Mouse under her arms 
firmly and 
> lifted her up. "Now get up, dang it! Ya ain't gonna give up! Ya 
ever see me 
> give up b'fore? Move yer dang legs!" He kicked at her closest foot, 
trying 
> to move it. "Move!"
>
